# Stand Against the Tide (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]] \[[[Earth Spells|earth]]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 1]], [[1st Level Druid Spells|Druid 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 1]], [[BoXM 2nd-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 2]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Close (25 feet + 5 feet/two levels)

**Target:** One creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 feet apart

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Book of Experimental Might I (Malhavoc Press), pg. 76

Creatures affected by this spell gain a +2 bonus to Armor Class and a +4 bonus on Strength checks made to resist being bull rushed or tripped as long as they remain in place, keep to their feet, and stand upon solid ground. If they move, they lose the bonus until they once again remain in place for a full round.
